TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers

Class AcceptOrDeclineContactRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.AcceptOrDeclineContactRequestController

  • public class AcceptOrDeclineContactRequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    controls flow when the user accepts or declines a contact-add request

    • Constructor Summary

      This function responds to a contact request.
      void onAcceptContactRequestEvent(java.lang.String username)
      This is called by HomeScreen when the onAcceptContactRequestEvent occurs If the contact is not already in the contacts list, then it adds the contact to the contact list, and tells the server to add the contact.

      This is called by HomeScreen when the onDeclineContactRequestEvent occurs Removes the contact-add request Alerts the user of the response Tells homescreen to reload

    • Method Detail

      • onAcceptContactRequestEvent

        public void onAcceptContactRequestEvent(java.lang.String username)
        This is called by HomeScreen when the onAcceptContactRequestEvent occurs If the contact is not already in the contacts list, then it adds the contact to the contact list, and tells the server to add the contact. Removes the contact-add request Alerts the user of the response Tells homescreen to reload
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the contact whos contact-add request has been accepted

      • actuallyReplyToContactRequest

        public void actuallyReplyToContactRequest(AppUser contact,
                                          AppJid jid,
                                          boolean accepted)
        This function responds to a contact request. It is called by connectionController, so that it can be ensured that the app is connected before sending the response.
        Parameters:
        contact - the contact to reply to.
        jid - the jid of the contact to reply to.
        accepted - if the request was accepted or declined.

      • onDeclineContactRequestEvent

        public void onDeclineContactRequestEvent(java.lang.String username)
        This is called by HomeScreen when the onDeclineContactRequestEvent occurs Removes the contact-add request Alerts the user of the response Tells homescreen to reload
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the contact whos contact-add request has been declined

        public void setOnChangeScreen(ChangeScreen changeScreen)
